text.text_translated:
People from different places can act differently. It is good to know this. This knowledge helps us understand people. It helps us avoid problems when we talk. But we must be careful. This knowledge can create stereotypes.

Stereotypes are simple ideas about a group of people. These ideas are often wrong. We must not use stereotypes. They are very bad for business relationships.

A person's national culture is one part of them. But many other things are also important. A person comes from a region. This region is important. Their age is important. Their job is important. Their life is also important.

So, cultural knowledge is helpful. But we should not always think about it. We must not think all people from one country are the same. Every person is different.

best_attempt.text_translated:
People from different places can act differently. It is good to know this. This helps us understand other people. It helps us avoid problems.

But we must be very careful. We should not use stereotypes. Stereotypes are simple ideas about a group of people. These ideas are often wrong. Using stereotypes is very bad for business.

A country's culture can change our thoughts and actions. But many other things are also important. The place we are from is important. The people we know are important. Our age is important. Our job and our life also change us.

So, knowledge about culture is useful. But we must use it carefully. We should not think all people from one country are the same. Every person is different.
